<!-- StreamElements Heist Widget Project Instructions -->

This is a StreamElements custom widget project for a text-based heist game using loyalty points.

## Project Structure
- HTML widget interface for StreamElements overlay
- CSS for widget styling
- JavaScript for heist game logic and chat integration
- Uses StreamElements API for chat responses and loyalty points

## Development Guidelines
- Keep code modular and well-commented
- Use StreamElements SE_API for chat integration
- Implement proper cooldown mechanics
- Include multiple risk levels and outcomes
- Make configuration easy to modify
